latex:
Consider the sequence defined recursively by $u_1 = a$ (any positive integer), and $u_{n+1} = \frac{-1}{u_n+1}, n = 1,2,3,\cdots$ For which of the following values of $n$ must $u_n = a$?\\
\\
$\textbf{(A)}\ 14 \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ 15 \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 16 \qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ 17 \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ 18$
